events.message: I recently received my order and noticed that the product has several scratches and a faulty screen. This is very disappointing as it seems damaged on arrival.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to the description of scratches and faulty screen upon delivery.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in product defects to assist you further.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the faulty screen so we can assess the damage and proceed with the best solution?
I have attached several photos clearly showing the scratches on the surface and the screen not turning on properly. Please advise on next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product at no additional cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to proceed with the replacement option. Thank you for handling this swiftly and offering a solution that works for me.
Your replacement has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We appreciate your patience and apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that everything is now in perfect condition.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please feel free to contact us again if you need further assistance in the future.
